description: Pylint warning baseline - PRs introducing warnings above these thresholds will fail

C0413.reason: Intentional pattern for sys.path modifications before imports

W0603.reason: Intentional singleton pattern for module-level state

I1101.reason: False positives from C extensions (cv2, numpy, etc.)

notes: This baseline represents intentionally skipped warnings
Any new warnings not in this baseline will fail the PR
To add a new intentional warning, update this file with justification
Run './automation/ci-cd/run-lint-stage.sh full' to verify current counts
